articles.description: Charlie Brooks was spotted returning home with an enormous suitcase on Friday. The EastEnders actress - who won I'm A Celebrity in 2012 - was rumoured to have headed to Wales where she was on stand-by to appear on this year's show
articles.content:
Charlie Brooks looked far from impressed as she was spotted returning home from Wales after ITV bosses reportedly sent her home.
The 39-year-old actress - known for playing Janine Butcher on BBC's E… [+2285 chars]

articles.title: The Dance Floor Is Always at the Center of Steve McQueen’s ‘Lovers Rock’ - Rolling Stone
articles.description: The second chapter of the five-film Small Axe, in which Steve McQueen attempts to excavate glimpses of black British life from the Sixties through the Eighties, is rooted in reggae

articles.title: ‘Smallville’ actor John Glover to play mystery role in ‘Fear The Walking Dead’ season 6 - NME
articles.description: The cast for season six of 'Fear The Walking Dead' just got bigger, adding 'Smallville' actor John Glover in a mystery role.
articles.content:
Smallville actor John Glover is set to join season six of Fear The Walking Dead in a mystery role.
